sourcesContent: import { Component, ElementRef, ViewChild} from '@angular/core'; import { SlickCarouselComponent } from 'ngx-slick-carousel'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { slides = [ { img: './../../../assets/images/carousel_slide1.jpg', alt: 'Nature slide' }, { img: './../../../assets/images/carousel_slide2.jpg', alt: 'Animals slide' }, { img: './../../../assets/images/carousel_slide3.jpg', alt: 'People slide' } ]; public slideConfig = { slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, dots: true, arrows: false, }; public currentSlide = 0; public onSlideChange(event: any) { this.currentSlide = event.currentSlide; } }
